start.description: You are hitch hiking on a desolate road. A white van pulls over. The driver offers you a ride.
start.instructions: To get in, say 1. To wait and see what happens, say 2.

1.say: You get in the white van.

hint.say: You get the feeling that you just dodged a bad situation...

room2.description: You are in the creepy white van. The driver is going to the beach. This is your last chance to run away.
room2.instructions: To run away, say 1. To have a beachin' good time, say 2.

hint.say: You pass a troupe of angry, rabid monkeys and you are happy that you stayed in the van.

end-room-good.description: You made it to the beach! Congratulations!
end-room-good.instructions: You may say "leave" to go for a swim.

quit.say: As you walk to the sea to go for a swim, you stop to look at a shiny seashell.
And then a meteor descends upon you from the heavens, killing you instantly.

end-room-bad.description: Before you know it, a meteor descends from the heavens and kills you in a fiery blaze.
end-room-bad.instructions: You may say "restart" to start over or say "leave" to end the adventure.

restart.say: You are reincarnated as a beach bound hitch hiker.
